sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './about.css'; import AboutImg from '../../assets/about.jpg'; import CV from '../../assets/Nitin Ahirwal Cv.pdf'; import Info from './Info'; const About = () => { return (

About Me

My Introduction

I am a person who can handle all the responsibilities of a web application development process, including front-end and back-end development. I am proficient in various programming languages and frameworks such as JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React, Angular, Node.js, Express, and can work with databases like MySQL, MongoDB, etc.As a full stack developer i have a solid understanding of web development concepts and can work on both client-side and server-side code to create robust and scalable web applications.

Download Cv
) } export default About;
